SummaryEnglish: In the year 2043, Infinite Dendrogram, the world's first successful full-dive VRMMO was released. In addition to its ability to perfectly simulate the five senses, along with its many other amazing features, the game promised to offer players a world full of infinite possibilities. Nearly two years later, soon-to-be college freshman, Reiji Mukudori, is finally able to buy a copy of the game and start playing. With some help from his experienced older brother, Shu, and his partner Embryo, Reiji embarks on an adventure into the world of Infinite Dendrogram.

1.SummaryEnglish: Reiji Mukudori enters an immersive VRMMO that's more realistic than he thought possible. Luckily, his big brother Shu is there to show him the ropes.

2.SummaryEnglish: Ray takes the perfect job and goes grinding for levels, but winds up geting more than he bargained for. A trip to the Tomb Labyrinth proves fruitful.

3.SummaryEnglish: Ray and friends see how the player killers--most of them--were shut down and eliminated. The party chooses a quest to complete on their way to Gideon.

4.TitleEnglish: Like a Flag Flying the Reversal
4.SummaryEnglish: The party soon realizes it'll take brains, brawn, and maybe a little something extra to save a group of tians from the Great Miasmic Ogre, Gardranda.

5.SummaryEnglish: Overhearing a young woman's pleas, Ray winds up taking on a quest with fellow Master Hugo Lesseps to rescue children from a truly distasteful gang.

6.SummaryEnglish: Ray and Nemesis fight the monster responsble for the zombification of the captured children: Maise, a Lich hell-bent on becoming immortal.

7.SummaryEnglish: Marie invites Ray to Gideon to attend the Clash of the Superiors, an all-out arena battle between two mighty warriors. Figaro and Shu chat in private.

8.SummaryEnglish: It's Figaro the Endless Chain versus Master Jiangshi Xinyu in a high-speed, no-holds-barred bout--and as it turns out, that's just the opening act.

9.SummaryEnglish: It might be up to Ray and his fellow newbies to defend Gideon against Franklin, who's taken a princess hostage and unleashed monsters on the populace.

10.SummaryEnglish: Marie finds herself up against a deadly talented Composer and his malevolent musicians, while Franklin reveals a brand-new and highly lethal monster.

11.TitleEnglish: The Right Arm of the Victor
11.SummaryEnglish: Rook goes all-out against Hugo as Ray tackles mad Franklin's RSK, a grotesque creature tailor-made to avenge its creator as Ray's perfect opponent.

12.SummaryEnglish: The battle against Franklin is far from over as he reveals trick after trick he'd stashed up his sleeve. The King of Destruction comes in with a bang.

13.SummaryEnglish: Ray confronts Franklin atop the beastly Pandemonium as Fatoum makes his move. Frankin has a heart-to-heart with Hugo, and Ray learns his nickname.
